content: swiss pointe designs> all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically a b place marker for bor after picking up and knitting the 40 sts on side c a edis side b side c start here place marker for bor urban knitwear + fiber art | for wearers + makers slow fashion made unique spd is a one-woman show sharing love for the fiber arts through slow fashion + creative therapy i d to see your finished spd knits and hear from you xoxo - genny questions comments shout-outs contact @swisspointe www swisspointedesigns com genny@swisspointedesigns com
